Text:
Listening to this great rare gem and to How We Live reminded me of Steve Hogarth's and Colin Moore's London-based band called Europeans. I wonder if you possess their 1983 album Vocabulary and better known and probably their best album Recurring Dreams from 1984. I couldn't find them in your previous posts, but I could be wrong.
Thanks 80z once again for your hard but greatly appreciated work.
Cheers.
Whirly Girl is a great track

r.trifun look here for Vocabulary:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4639237

I do have Recurring Dreams LP but I am not sure I ever posted it.

just want to say I appreciate all the hard work you do making these old platters new again. I'm finding it hard to locate a good mp3 version of an '83 album buy a band called "The Pumps". The album was called "Gotta Move". Had a couple couple of great songs on it "Coffee with the Queen" and a song called "Success". I believe they latter turned into the band Orphan. I see there is also a combo CD of The Best of Orphan & The Pumps that came out a few years back. Can you help with this? Thanks!!!
Thanks for helping me find some great 80's music.  Do you happen to have The Vels "House Of Miracles"?
geek and robert. I have your requests. I will upload them shortly. cheers
